title: Maternal dietary flavonoid intake and child wheeze and asthma in the Conditions Affecting Neurocognitive Development and Learning in Early Childhood (CANDLE) cohort.
abstract: Higher intakes of flavonoids have been associated with better lung function in adults. The aim of this study was to examine the associations between maternal prenatal intake of flavonoids and offspring asthma and wheeze.
journal: Pediatric allergy and immunology : official publication of the European Society of Pediatric Allergy and Immunology
